title: S&P 500 slides closer toward bear market territory as stocks extend losses - Yahoo Finance
content: S&P 500 slides closer toward bear market territory as stocks extend losses  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks fell deeper into the red Thursday after markets failed to claw back from their worst day since June 2020. The declines extend a recent sell-off in equities ignited by worries the Federal Reserve's interest rate hikes to rein in persistent levels of inflation may spur an economic slowdown.
